item.title: Family celebrates Rosh Hashanah with mix of new memories and important traditions
item.description: Dan and Brittany Gruber are preparing for the Jewish New Year by creating new memories with their daughters, Lilah and Hannah.

item.title: Artist designs new Cubs Jersey, combining Chicago sports and Latino traditions
item.description: The Cubs jersey designed by Liz Flores will be available during Hispanic and Latino Heritage Night at Wrigley Field on Sept. 25.

item.title: 9/23: CBS Mornings Plus
item.description: President Trump will address the United Nations General Assembly. Also, why compassion and connection are critical to health care.

item.title: Many Hispanic Heritage Month celebrations scrapped due to ICE raid fears
item.description: ICE raids, the federally led English-only initiative and an anti-DEI push have changed the national climate in which Hispanic Heritage Month celebrati...

item.title: Nexstar to continue preempting "Jimmy Kimmel Live!" after ABC return
item.description: Nexstar on Tuesday said it will monitor the late-night show as it returns to ABC tonight.
